text: 8.44 Mat 13.38, 1 Jo 3.8, Jud 6 Nɨbi nap nɨbi Satan ñapay mɨdebɨm ak nɨm, ne gos nɨgup adek anep gun agɨl nɨŋɨd kɨles gɨpɨm agak. Ne pel binɨb okok kɨlop ñag pak lolɨgup agak. Takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agep tek ma lup anɨb ak tek, gos nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ogɨnap nɨŋɨd mɨdtep ma gup agak. Takaw yepɨs yɨbɨl agek agek nɨm, takaw anɨb ak takaw ne yɨbɨl lup agak. Ne bɨ yepɨs agep mɨdeb, takaw yepɨs agep mɨdupsek jɨj ak agak.
